name: Devil Engine
description: A last ditch effort to destroy what was once to be our savior. A final mission to eliminate a disastrous future. A single ship against Earthâ€™s entire military. The Andraste is the only hope to defeat...the Devil Engine.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7,Windows 8 Processor: 2+ GHZ Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: Shader model 3.0 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 512 MB available space Sound Card: Stereo sound Additional Notes: Steam connection required for online leaderboards
